## IDataStore.dataStoreSaveMessage() method

Saves message to the data store

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
dataStoreSaveMessage(args: IDataStoreSaveMessageArgs): Promise<string>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  args | [IDataStoreSaveMessageArgs](./core.idatastoresavemessageargs.md) | message |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;string&gt;

a promise that resolves to the id of the message
